column2: "Ao
column5: Na ma mo sufrɛ ndu w’enyim."

column2: "Mma nnyi w’enyim nnhuntsa me wɔ m’ahokyer da mu: Brɛ w’aso adze ma me; Da a musu mefrɛ no
"Na me nda hi dɛ wusiw
column3: Na me mbiew hyew dɛ nyena."

column2: "M’akoma abɔ dɛ nkyɛkyɛr
column3: na akyenkyen. Na mo werɛ fir dɛ midzi m’edziban."

column2: "M’apensi ndze ntsi Me mbiew afemfam mo honam mu."
"Metse dɛ sar do ɔpɛtɛ: Mayɛ dɛ amamfo do ɔpatu."
"Misi pe
column3: na mayɛ dɛ Ɔsorɔm a no nko wɔ ɔdan etsifi."

column2: "M’atamfo hyɛ me ahorba adzekyee nyinara; Hɔn a woegyim wɔ mo do dze me dom."
"Osian w’ebufuw na w’ebufuhyew ntsi
"Na medze nyinsuwa afora m’anondze: Osiandɛ ɔwo ama me do
"Me nda tse dɛ ewimbir nwinwin; Na mekyenkyen dɛ nkyɛkyɛr."
"Naaso ɔwo
column4: ebɛtsena hɔ daa; Na wo nkaa bodu mbasantsen nyinara do."

column2: "Ɔwo ebɔsoɛr ebohu Zion mbɔbɔr: Na mber a ɔsɛ dɛ wohu no mbɔbɔr nye yi
"Na wo nkowaa enyi gye n’abo ho
column3: Na wonya ayamuhyehye wɔ no huntuma ho."

column2: "Nna amanaman bosuro EWURADZE ne dzin
column3: Na asaase do ahemfo nyinara esuro w’enyimnyam."

column2: "Na EWURADZE akyekyer Zion
column3: Oeyi noho edzi wɔ n’enyimnyam mu;"

column2: "Ɔdze n’enyi aba onnyibi ne mpaabɔ do
"Wɔbɛkyerɛw iyi ama mbasantsen a wɔreba: Na aman a wɔbɔbɔ hɔn no beyi EWURADZE ayɛw."
"Na oefi no krɔnkrɔnbea sor hɔ ahwɛ famu; Ɔsor na EWURADZE fi ahwɛ asaase;"
"Dɛ obetsie ɔdaduanyi apensi; Dɛ ɔbɛsan hɔn a wɔrokɔ owu mu;"
"Ama adasa aabɔ EWURADZE ne dzin akyerɛ wɔ Zion
"Aber a aman na ahendzi ahorow
column3: Aboaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔbɔsom EWURADZE."

column2: "EWURADZE egura m’ahoɔdzen wɔ kwan no mu; Oetwa me nda do tsia."
"Ao
column4: mese dɛ mma nntwa me nnkyen wɔ me nda finimfin: Ɔwo a wo mfe kyɛr kodu mbasantsen nyinara do."

column2: "Tsetseetse na ɔwo etoow asaase ne fapem; Na ɔsorsor yɛ wo nsaano edwuma."
"Hɔn wɔbɛsɛɛ
column5: hɔn nyinara bosuw dɛ atar; Ɔwo ebɛsakyer hɔn dɛ efuradze

column2: "Naaso ɔwo dze
"Wo nkowaa mba bɛtsena hɔ
column3: Na hɔn asefo etsim wɔ w’enyim."
